name: M U T H E Y U M
name_original: M U T H E Y U M
description:
1-Bit Jam 2021 theme is 'only black and white pixel' and '1 Button'.

You broke into a museum to steal a very rare statue.
But watch out for the statues, they are alive.

You need to pick up some batteries on the road to survive, it's very dark in the museum tonight.

Use :

  • Arrows or WASD for move
  • Mouse or QE to rotate
  • Space or CTRL to jump,
  • Left click or F to switch on/off flashlight

When you get the chest icon, you win. Feel free to continue the visit after that.
